name: A Town, Nowhere
description:
A mysterious town looms behind you. You're going to have to make a choice, and you’re not going to like it. 

Created by two Game Development: Writing students (Monocatari and Katie Campkin) for the Falmouth University Writer's Guild Game Jam 2023, A Town, Nowhere is an interactive fiction game created in Twine. There are three available endings, with some variations throughout depending on what has been explored. 

WARNING: This game contains descriptions of dead animals and unsettling imagery. Play at your own discretion.
